thread.title: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Are Back Together?
thread.title_full: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Are Back Together?

title: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Are Back Together?
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Amber Rose had been really heartbroken after her split with husband Wiz Khalifa . Now the model who has always worn her emotions on her sleeve might be reuniting with her estranged husband. 
This reunion comes days after her incredibly moving speech during her SlutWalk event on October 3 where she forgave Wiz saying, "[Wiz] went on to make a song saying that he fell in love with a stripper, but fell out of love quicker," Amber said. "As you can imagine, him being the love of my life, regardless of us going through a separation or not it was extremely hurtful." 
"I also forgive Wiz for what he said," Amber told the crowd. "Wiz actually apologized to me already, so I have forgiven him." 
Amber Rose also spoke about Kanye West ! "I've decided to have this SlutWalk for women who have been through s-t," Amber told the crowd. Even though I am up here crying, I want to be the strong person you all look up to and to apologize for all guys. I want to forgive Kanye about what he said about me. I want to let all of that negativity go." 
Sebastian's parents who were married for a year until she filed for divorce in September 2014, posed for an adorable pic together and she posted it on Instagram on October 5. 
"Still Ballin üòç," she captioned the selfie. She had raved about her 28-year-old estranged husband in the past too. Despite his cheating scandal rumours, the model on April 2, took to Instagram to write a long post about Wiz, admitting that her "heart beats for him" and that he was her "man crush everyday."
